Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Pies = { {MeshId = 18417911, TextureId = 18417918, Name = "ApplePie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.825, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 4, Rarity = 90}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311968, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = true, Damage = 5, Rarity = 75}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311869, Name = "BlueberryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = true, Damage = 5, Rarity = 75}, {MeshId = 143518445, TextureId = 143499030, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.35, 0.5), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 8), (math.pi / 2), 0), Offset = Vector3.new(-0.05, 0.85, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, (math.pi / 1)), RotateFace = false, Damage = 6, Rarity = 65}, {MeshId = 65950268, TextureId = 65950352, Name = "PumpkinPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.6), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(-0.05, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = true, Damage = 7, Rarity = 50}, {MeshId = 18453224, TextureId = 18453205, Name = "PumpkinPi", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2.5), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0.8, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 10, Rarity = 35}, {MeshId = 148484293, TextureId = 148484299, Name = "PiSymbol", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.65, 0.75), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0), FiringAngle = CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 35, Rarity = 15}, {MeshId = 125732887, TextureId = 125728597, Name = "PizzaPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.6, 0.6, 0.6), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 20), 0, 0), Offset = Vector3.new(-0.05, 0.75, -0.05), FiringAngle = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0), RotateFace = false, Damage = 5, Rarity = 25} }
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id="
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") FireSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire") PieScript = Tool:WaitForChild("PieScript")
Necklace = InsertService:LoadAsset(147198993):GetChildren()[1]:Clone()
RandomPies = {}
for i, v in pairs(Pies) do for ii = 1, v.Rarity do table.insert(RandomPies, v) end end
-- Returns a character ancestor and its Humanoid, or nil function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function CreatePie() if not Pie then for i, v in pairs(Handle:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v:Destroy() end end ChosenPie = RandomPies[math.random(1, #RandomPies)] Pie = Instance.new("Part") Pie.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Pie.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Pie.Name = ChosenPie.Name Pie.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Pie.Size = ChosenPie.Size local PieMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") PieMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh PieMesh.MeshId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.MeshId PieMesh.TextureId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.TextureId PieMesh.Scale = ChosenPie.Scale PieMesh.Parent = Pie Pie.Parent = Handle Pie.CFrame = Handle.CFrame Pie.CFrame = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, Handle.CFrame.lookVector) Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Handle Weld.Part1 = Pie Weld.C0 = Weld.C0 * ChosenPie.Angle + ChosenPie.Offset Weld.Parent = Pie end end
function Fire(v) if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false
if not Pie then
CreatePie()
else
local LocalPie = Pie local LocalChosenPie = ChosenPie
Pie = nil
FireSound:Play() Debris:AddItem(LocalPie, 10) if Weld and Weld.Parent then Weld:Destroy() end LocalPie.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
local Launch = Handle.Position + 5 * v
LocalPie.CFrame = CFrame.new(Launch + ((LocalChosenPie.RotateFace and v) or Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)), Launch + ((not LocalChosenPie.RotateFace and v) or Vector3.new(0, 0, 0))) LocalPie.CFrame = LocalPie.CFrame * LocalChosenPie.FiringAngle LocalPie.Velocity = v * 100
LocalPie.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local parent, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if parent ~= Character and humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(LocalChosenPie.Damage) end end end)
local Force = Instance.new("BodyForce") Force.force = Vector3.new(0, 24 ,0) Force.Parent = LocalPie
local Gyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") Gyro.D = 500 Gyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) Gyro.P = 3000 Gyro.Parent = LocalPie
local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Value = Character Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Parent = LocalPie
local Damage_Tag = Instance.new("NumberValue") Damage_Tag.Value = LocalChosenPie.Damage Damage_Tag.Name = "Damage" Damage_Tag.Parent = LocalPie
local PieScriptClone = PieScript:Clone() PieScriptClone.Disabled = false PieScriptClone.Parent = LocalPie
end
wait(0.25)
Tool.Enabled = true end end
function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not Character or not Humanoid or not Player then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(3) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function OnActivated() if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local TargetPos = Humanoid.TargetPoint local LookAt = (TargetPos - Handle.Position).unit Fire(LookAt) end end
function OnUnequipped() end
CreatePie()
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Pie = script.Parent
BodyGyro = Pie:WaitForChild("BodyGyro") BodyForce = Pie:WaitForChild("BodyForce") Creator = Pie:WaitForChild("creator") Damage = Pie:WaitForChild("Damage")
local HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=18424769" HitSound.Parent = Pie HitSound.Volume = 0.5
function Stick(Hit)
local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Name = "PieWeld" Weld.Part0 = Pie Weld.Part1 = Hit
local HitPos = Pie.Position
local CJ = CFrame.new(HitPos) local C0 = Pie.CFrame:inverse() *CJ local C1 = Hit.CFrame:inverse() * CJ
Weld.C0 = C0 Weld.C1 = C1
Weld.Parent = Pie
end
function OnTouched(Hit)
if Hit and Hit.Parent then
BodyGyro:Destroy() BodyForce:Destroy()
Stick(Hit) HitSound:Play()
local Humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then local Creator_Tag = Creator:Clone() Creator_Tag.Value = Creator.Value Creator_Tag.Parent = Humanoid Humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage.Value) end
Connection:disconnect()
end
end
Connection = Pie.Touched:connect(OnTouched)
for i = 1, 10 do wait(0.1 * i) if BodyGyro then local v = Pie.Velocity.unit BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(1e4, 1e4, 1e4) BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), -v) end end
wait(8)
Pie:Destroy()
